text: @gsgarima36 @VidyaKrishnan @SetuAarogya @narendramodi The only aim with which it was developed under the instructions of @amitabhk87 by @arnabthakur and team was to get your personal information and then brag about the number of downloads (That's Modi modus operandi 101). They've achieved that. COVID-19 was just an excuse.
